XenotypeDef.label: tenno
XenotypeDef.description: We took the twisted few that had returned from that place. We built a frame around them, a conduit of their affliction. Gave them the weapons of the old ways. Gun and blade. A new warrior, a new code was born. These rejects, these Tenno, became our saviors. Warrior-Gods cast in steel and fury striking our enemies in a way they could never comprehend.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Warrior-Gods cast in steel and fury striking our enemies in a way they could never comprehend.
